meanings.definition: Analyzed in too much detail or to an excessive extent.
meanings.sent1: The overanalyzed report contained unnecessary information.
meanings.sent2: She felt overanalyzed by her classmates' constant questions.
meanings.sent3: The detective's overanalyzed theory led to a humorous misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: His overanalyzed approach to painting stifled his creativity.
meanings.sent5: The overanalyzed puzzle had too many unnecessary pieces.

meanings.definition: Subjected to excessive scrutiny or examination.
meanings.sent1: The overanalyzed experiment yielded no new results.
meanings.sent2: The overanalyzed document was filled with unnecessary comments.
meanings.sent3: The overanalyzed situation at work made everyone laugh at the absurdity.
meanings.sent4: Her overanalyzed speech was like a dissected frog, losing its essence.
meanings.sent5: The overanalyzed painting had too many brush strokes, losing its beauty.
